text.autoconfig.owoify.title: OwOify configuration
text.autoconfig.owoify.option.owOifyText: If true, all text will get OwOified.
text.autoconfig.owoify.option.emotionify: Changes the appearance of all letters.
text.autoconfig.owoify.option.reversifyT: If true, the text will be presented in reverse.
text.autoconfig.owoify.option.eminemifyT: If true, all spaces will be gone.
